# NSWindow.ToolbarStyle.preference

**Case**

A style indicating that the toolbar appears below the window title with toolbar items centered in the toolbar.

## Declaration

```swift
case preference
```

## Styles

- **NSWindow.ToolbarStyle.automatic**: A style indicating that the system determines the toolbar’s appearance and location.
- **NSWindow.ToolbarStyle.expanded**: A style indicating that the toolbar appears below the window title.
- **NSWindow.ToolbarStyle.unified**: A style indicating that the toolbar appears next to the window title.
- **NSWindow.ToolbarStyle.unifiedCompact**: A style indicating that the toolbar appears next to the window title and with reduced margins to allow more focus on the window’s contents.
